title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 4 SOLD
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: T202 McBride/Milan Shoeless Joe Jackson SGC 4 SOLD
posts.post_content:
This is one of the 2 T202 cards featuring Shoeless Joe in the middle panel-confirmed as Joe by the Joe Jackson Museum, as well as the awesome members on this board. The center panel has a little bend to it that can only be seen if you look at the card from the side. The Price is sold delivered PayPal no fees please. Thank you for checking out my sale.

Joe K
